headline: Michael Burry Warns Alphabet's 100-Year Bond Move Mirrors Motorola's 1997 Decline
summary: "Big Short" investor Michael Burry issued a warning Monday about Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL) (GOOG) planning to issue 100-year bonds, drawing parallels to Motorola Solutions Inc.'s (NYSE: MSI) downfall following a similar move in 1997.

headline: Robinhood, AppLovin, Rivian and More Stocks With Earnings This Week
summary: Investors are anticipating reports from Robinhood, Pinterest, Rivian and more. Here's a look at the earnings calendar for the week ahead.
